refers: MANIPULATION & HANDLING OF FOODSTUFF WHILE PREPARING OR COOKING IT

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/state of handling/manipulating food while preparing it for cooking
stems.CTE: (to be) in a state of being handled/manipulated while under preparation for cooking
stems.CSV: (to be) the physical act of handling/manipulating food while cooking it
stems.OBJ: (to be) the tool/utensil used to handle/manipulate food while cooking/preparing it

stems: (to be) an act/state of handling/manipulating food while cooking it or processing it for ingestion
(to be) an act/state of handling manipulating food while serving it or ingesting it

refers: HOLDING & CONTAINING OF FOODSTUFF FOR PREPARING OR COOKING OR SERVING IT

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/state of holding/containing food while preparing it for cooking
stems.CTE: (to be) in a state of being held/contained while under preparation for cooking
stems.CSV: (to be) the physical act of holding/containing food while cooking it
stems.OBJ: (to be) the object/implement used to hold/contain food while cooking/preparing it

stems: (to be) an act/state of holding/containing food while cooking it or preparing it for ingestion
(to be) an act/state of holding/containing food for the purpose of serving it or as a result of serving it
